Server
Class Data

java.lang.Object
  Server.Data

public class Data
extends java.lang.Object

The class to hold all server data and deal with requests of the data.

Removes old booking and creates a new booking

Parameters:
customer - the customer name
film - the film name
date - the film date
time - the film time
oldSeats - the number of seats the old reservation had
newSeats - the number of seats for the new reservation to have
Returns:
true if able to make new booking and false if could not.
